description: {W A broad tarmac opens, inviting airships to land.  One end
stretches down into a path, numerous docks branching off of it; on the
other end of the tarmack sits the entrance to a long, skinny building
that stretches parallel to the path.  It wraps around the docks and
meets a large building set up at the end of the docking strip.  A pair
of cracked windows look out from the near end of the building, and
drifts of snow are piled at the sides of the tarmac.  {x
57372.name: {CE{wntrance {Ct{wo {Ct{whe {CC{wargo {CD{wocks {C[{wMahn'Tor Courier{C]{x

description: {B Turning sharply, a narrow hallway branches off the loading docks.
A lantern hangs in the corner, slowly burning makou gas and casting
shadows in every direction.  The air is old, dust covering the lantern
and giving the hall a musty smell.  The sounds from the docks are loud
here.  {x
57339.name: {CL{cong {CH{callway {C[{cNew Thalos Courier{C]{x

description: {B Despite being large, with its high ceilings and almost cavernous
dimensions, the room is cluttered and cramped.  Endless rows of
scaffolds, shelves, and platforms hold numerous crates of all shapes
and sizes.  Tarps are stretches across the floor, and signs label
various areas for fragile, perishable, or expensive cargo.  A system
of pulleys and a number of ramps and scattered through the room, and
57337.name: {CC{courier {CI{cnventory {C[{cNew Thalos Courier{C]{x

description: {m A narrow, windowless hallway leads from the manager's office to
the loading docks.  A thin coat of dust layers the floor and walls,
and the occasional lantern hangs on the wall casting a dim light.
Clattering and the odd shout sounds from the docks, breaking the
silence.  {x
57396.name: {ML{yong {MH{yallway {M[{yVector Courier{M]{x

description: {m Enclosed but for the open entrance, the dock is just large enough
for a large ship.  Rickety scaffolding lines the walls, ladders and
the rare set of stairs climbing from one level to the next.  Various
crates of all sizes are stacked in random piles on the scaffolds, and
other mounds are covered with bulky beige tarps.  At the back of the
dock is a large platform for loading and unloading, a tall pulley
system set up on it with poles and rope.  {x
57389.name: {MD{yock {MA {M[{yVector Courier{M]{x

description: {w A wide platform connects a loading dock to Dock B, set up with a
tall pulley system.  A gently-angled ramp leads onto the platform, and
a lever system stands to one side of the platform.  Scaffolds line the
walls, connecting to those of the inventory room and the dock,
scattered with crates and carts.  A doorway leads off into a hallway
in one direction, and makou-burning lights hang from the ceiling.  {x
57408.name: {WL{*oading {WD{*ock {WB {W[{*Dwarven Kingdom Courier{W]{x

description: {g A broad entrance strip is here, two tall poles standing to either
side of it.  Each is topped with a large globe that shines with
burning makou gas at night, acting as a guide light for incoming
ships.  A large sign hangs off one pole.  {x
{x                    {w|      {GWESTBRIDGE     {w|{x
{x                    {w|        {GCARGO        {w|{x
{x                    {w|       {GCOURIER       {w|{x
57316.name: {GO{*utside {Gt{*he {GC{*ourier {G[{*Westbridge Courier{G]{x

description: {w A narrow, windowless hallway leads from the manager's office to
the loading docks.  A thin coat of dust layers the floor and walls,
and the occasional lantern hangs on the wall casting a dim light.
Clattering and the odd shout sounds from the docks, breaking the
silence.  {x
57410.name: {WL{*ong {WH{*allway {W[{*Dwarven Kingdom Courier{W]{x

description: {r Stale air carries an odd scent in the lobby of the courier.  Dingy
curtains hang to the sides of the windows, tied hastily aside and
forgotten.  Against one wall is a couch, flattened and stained from
years of use, and a small table sits to one side with a dirty ashtray
on it.  A stool stands against the opposite wall with a dead potted
plant on it, its leaves brown and cracked.  The walls are bare except
a single abstract painting that hangs crookedly above the couch.  {x
57426.name: {RB{yuilding {RL{yobby{x

description: {g The tarmac stretches out east and west, a broad strip with docks
on either side.  Each dock is a separate building with an open face to
the strip; there is a small door on the side of each as well to admit
workers and smaller cargo.  A glimpse of metal, woodwork, and crates
is visible through the opening of each dock, and a sign labels each.  {x
{x
{&[ {RNorth{*: {CDOCK A                             {&]{x
{&[ {MEast {*: {CCOURIER INVENTORY & CARGO DROP OFF {&]{x
{&[ {rSouth{*: {CDOCK B                             {&]{x
57317.name: {GD{*ocking {GS{*trip {G[{*Westbridge Courier{G]{x

description: {w The tarmac stretches out east and west, a broad strip with docks
on either side.  Each dock is a separate building with an open face to
the strip; there is a small door on the side of each as well to admit
workers and smaller cargo.  A glimpse of metal, woodwork, and crates
is visible through the opening of each dock, and a sign labels each.  {x
{x
{&[ {RNorth{*: {CDOCK A                             {&]{x
{&[ {MEast {*: {CCOURIER INVENTORY & CARGO DROP OFF {&]{x
{&[ {rSouth{*: {CDOCK B                             {&]{x
57401.name: {WD{*ocking {WS{*trip {W[{*Dwarven Kingdom Courier{W]{x

description: {W Despite being large, with its high ceilings and almost cavernous
dimensions, the room is cluttered and cramped.  Endless rows of
scaffolds, shelves, and platforms hold numerous crates of all shapes
and sizes.  Tarps are stretches across the floor, and signs label
various areas for fragile, perishable, or expensive cargo.  A system
of pulleys and a number of ramps and scattered through the room, and
discarded carts sit here and there on the floor.  {X
57379.name: {CC{wourier {CI{wnventory {C[{wMahn'Tor Courier{C]{x

description: {mA wide platform connects a loading dock to Dock A, set up with a
tall pulley system.  A gently-angled ramp leads onto the platform, and
a lever system stands to one side of the platform.  Scaffolds line the
walls, connecting to those of the inventory room and the dock,
scattered with crates and carts.  A door leads off in one direction,
and makou-burning lights hang from the ceiling.  {x
57390.name: {ML{yoading {MD{yock {MA {M[{yVector Courier{M]{x

description: {W The room is small, an oversized desk and collection of filing
cabinets leaving little room to move.  Papers are scattered
everywhere, atop cabinets, on the floor, and in heaping mounds
surrounding a filled ashtray on the desk.  The floor is covered in a
dirty, brown carpet that has long faded; it is dotted with tiny
cigarette burns and there is a large coffee stain in the corner.  Once
white, the paint on the bare walls is chipped and yellowed, and hints
of the original wood show around the larger dents and holes.  There is
an old chair shoved against the wall to one side of the door.  {x
57383.name: {CM{wanager's {CO{wffice {C[{wMahn'Tor Courier{C]{x

description: {W It is a tiny, dingy washroom that seems almost an afterthought to
the building.  There is a sink on one wall lined with mildew, and a
cracked mirror hangs above it.  The door closes, though the lock is
broken and the doorknob is loose.  The tile floor bubbles in places,
and a rank smell hangs in the air.  {x
57378.name: {CS{wtaff {CW{washroom {C[{wMahn'Tor Courier{C]{x

description: {w A broad entrance strip is here, two tall poles standing to either
side of it.  Each is topped with a large globe that shines with
burning makou gas at night, acting as a guide light for incoming
ships.  A large sign hangs off one pole.  {x
{x                    {w|   {WDWARVEN KINGDOM   {w|{x
{x                    {w|        {WCARGO        {w|{x
{x                    {w|       {WCOURIER       {w|{x

57415.name: {RD{yocking {RS{ytrip{x

description: {y There is dirt everywhere in this tiny room.  The counters are
covered in food stains and the walls are yellowed and scuffed.  A
small hole has been knocked in one wall, hidden behind a
poorly-positioned shelf.  Covered in a thin layer of dust, the floor
is spotted with spills and sticky to walk across.  Ashtrays are
scattered on a table in the center of the room, and a collection of
empty beer bottles is stuffed in one corner of the counter.  {x

of pulleys and a number of ramps and scattered through the room, and
discarded carts sit here and there on the floor.  {x
57421.name: {RC{yourier {RI{ynventory{x

description: {y It is a tiny, dingy washroom that seems almost an afterthought to
the building.  There is a sink on one wall lined with mildew, and a
cracked mirror hangs above it.  The door closes, though the lock is
broken and the doorknob is loose.  The tile floor bubbles in places,
and a rank smell hangs in the air.  {x
57364.name: {YS{gtaff {YW{gashroom {Y[{gTitan City Courier{Y]{x

description: {B The tarmac stretches out east and west, a broad strip with docks
on either side.  Each dock is a separate building with an open face to
the strip; there is a small door on the side of each as well to admit
workers and smaller cargo.  A glimpse of metal, woodwork, and crates
is visible through the opening of each dock, and a sign labels each.  {x
{x
{&[ {RNorth{*: {CDOCK A                             {&]{x

{&[ {rSouth{*: {CDOCK B                             {&]{x
57331.name: {CD{cocking {CS{ctrip {C[{cNew Thalos Courier{C]{x

description: {W Enclosed but for the open entrance, the dock is just large enough
for a large ship.  Rickety scaffolding lines the walls, ladders and
the rare set of stairs climbing from one level to the next.  Various
crates of all sizes are stacked in random piles on the scaffolds, and
other mounds are covered with bulky beige tarps.  At the back of the
dock is a large platform for loading and unloading, a tall pulley
system set up on it with poles and rope.  {x
57375.name: {CD{wock {CA {C[{wMahn'Tor Courier{C]{x

description: {* A narrow, windowless hallway leads from the manager's office to
the loading docks.  A thin coat of dust layers the floor and walls,
and the occasional lantern hangs on the wall casting a dim light.
Clattering and the odd shout sounds from the docks, breaking the
silence.  {x
57354.name: {WL{mong {WH{mallway {W[{mZozo Courier{W]{x

description: {g Stale air carries an odd scent in the lobby of the courier.  Dingy
curtains hang to the sides of the windows, tied hastily aside and
forgotten.  Against one wall is a couch, flattened and stained from
years of use, and a small table sits to one side with a dirty ashtray
on it.  A stool stands against the opposite wall with a dead potted
plant on it, its leaves brown and cracked.  The walls are bare except
a single abstract painting that hangs crookedly above the couch.  {x
57328.name: {GB{*uilding {GL{*obby {G[{*Westbridge Courier{G]{x

description: {* The room is small, an oversized desk and collection of filing
cabinets leaving little room to move.  Papers are scattered
everywhere, atop cabinets, on the floor, and in heaping mounds
surrounding a filled ashtray on the desk.  The floor is covered in a
dirty, brown carpet that has long faded; it is dotted with tiny
cigarette burns and there is a large coffee stain in the corner.  Once
white, the paint on the bare walls is chipped and yellowed, and hints
of the original wood show around the larger dents and holes.  There is
an old chair shoved against the wall to one side of the door.  {x
57355.name: {WM{manager's {WO{mffice {W[{mZozo Courier{W]{x

description: {r A broad tarmac opens, inviting airships to land.  One end
stretches down into a path, numerous docks branching off of it; on the
other end of the tarmack sits the entrance to a long, skinny building
that stretches parallel to the path.  It wraps around the docks and
meets a large building set up at the end of the docking strip.  A pair
of cracked windows look out from the near end of the building, and
sounds echo through the air from the Port.  {x
57414.name: {RE{yntrance {Rt{yo {Rt{yhe {RC{yargo {RD{yocks{x

description: {* Despite being large, with its high ceilings and almost cavernous
dimensions, the room is cluttered and cramped.  Endless rows of
scaffolds, shelves, and platforms hold numerous crates of all shapes
and sizes.  Tarps are stretches across the floor, and signs label
various areas for fragile, perishable, or expensive cargo.  A system
of pulleys and a number of ramps and scattered through the room, and
discarded carts sit here and there on the floor.  {x

description: {cThe tarmac stretches out east and west, a broad strip with docks

here.  {x
57367.name: {YL{gong {YH{gallway {Y[{gTitan City Courier{Y]{x

description: {* A wide platform connects a loading dock to Dock A, set up with a
tall pulley system.  A gently-angled ramp leads onto the platform, and
a lever system stands to one side of the platform.  Scaffolds line the
walls, connecting to those of the inventory room and the dock,
scattered with crates and carts.  A door leads off in one direction,
and makou-burning lights hang from the ceiling.  {x

description: {g There is dirt everywhere in this tiny room.  The counters are
covered in food stains and the walls are yellowed and scuffed.  A
small hole has been knocked in one wall, hidden behind a

is spotted with spills and sticky to walk across.  Ashtrays are
scattered on a table in the center of the room, and a collection of
empty beer bottles is stuffed in one corner of the counter.  {x

on either side.  Each dock is a separate building with an open face to
the strip; there is a small door on the side of each as well to admit
workers and smaller cargo.  A glimpse of metal, woodwork, and crates
is visible through the opening of each dock, and a sign labels each.  {x
{x
{&[ {RNorth{*: {CDOCK A                             {&]{x
{&[ {MEast {*: {CCOURIER INVENTORY & CARGO DROP OFF {&]{x
{&[ {rSouth{*: {CDOCK B                             {&]{x
57359.name: {YD{gocking {YS{gtrip {Y[{gTitan City Courier{Y]{x

description: {m There is dirt everywhere in this tiny room.  The counters are
covered in food stains and the walls are yellowed and scuffed.  A
small hole has been knocked in one wall, hidden behind a
poorly-positioned shelf.  Covered in a thin layer of dust, the floor
is spotted with spills and sticky to walk across.  Ashtrays are
scattered on a table in the center of the room, and a collection of
empty beer bottles is stuffed in one corner of the counter.  {X
57391.name: {MT{yhe {MB{yreak {MR{yoom {M[{yVector Courier{M]{x

description: {cDespite being large, with its high ceilings and almost cavernous
dimensions, the room is cluttered and cramped.  Endless rows of
scaffolds, shelves, and platforms hold numerous crates of all shapes
and sizes.  Tarps are stretches across the floor, and signs label
various areas for fragile, perishable, or expensive cargo.  A system
of pulleys and a number of ramps and scattered through the room, and
57310.name: {BC{bourier {BI{bnventory {B[{bPolaris Courier{B]{x

description: {W There is dirt everywhere in this tiny room.  The counters are
covered in food stains and the walls are yellowed and scuffed.  A
small hole has been knocked in one wall, hidden behind a
poorly-positioned shelf.  Covered in a thin layer of dust, the floor
is spotted with spills and sticky to walk across.  Ashtrays are
scattered on a table in the center of the room, and a collection of
empty beer bottles is stuffed in one corner of the counter.  {x
57377.name: {CT{whe {CB{wreak {CR{woom {C[{wMahn'Tor Courier{C]{x

description: {B Enclosed but for the open entrance, the dock is just large enough
for a large ship.  Rickety scaffolding lines the walls, ladders and
the rare set of stairs climbing from one level to the next.  Various
crates of all sizes are stacked in random piles on the scaffolds, and
other mounds are covered with bulky beige tarps.  At the back of the
dock is a large platform for loading and unloading, a tall pulley
system set up on it with poles and rope.  {x
57332.name: {CD{cock {CA {C[{cNew Thalos Courier{C]{x

description: {W The tarmac stretches out east and west, a broad strip with docks
on either side.  Each dock is a separate building with an open face to
the strip; there is a small door on the side of each as well to admit
workers and smaller cargo.  A glimpse of metal, woodwork, and crates
is visible through the opening of each dock, and a sign labels each.  {x
{x

57373.name: {CD{wocking {CS{wtrip {C[{wMahn'Tor Courier{C]{x

description: {W A wide platform connects a loading dock to Dock A, set up with a
tall pulley system.  A gently-angled ramp leads onto the platform, and
a lever system stands to one side of the platform.  Scaffolds line the
walls, connecting to those of the inventory room and the dock,
scattered with crates and carts.  A door leads off in one direction,
and makou-burning lights hang from the ceiling.  {x
57376.name: {CL{woading {CD{wock {CA {C[{wMahn'Tor Courier{C]{x

description: {g The room is small, an oversized desk and collection of filing
cabinets leaving little room to move.  Papers are scattered
everywhere, atop cabinets, on the floor, and in heaping mounds
surrounding a filled ashtray on the desk.  The floor is covered in a
dirty, brown carpet that has long faded; it is dotted with tiny
cigarette burns and there is a large coffee stain in the corner.  Once
white, the paint on the bare walls is chipped and yellowed, and hints
of the original wood show around the larger dents and holes.  There is
an old chair shoved against the wall to one side of the door.  {x
57327.name: {GM{*anager's {GO{*ffice {G[{*Westbridge Courier{G]{x

description: {cThe room is small, an oversized desk and collection of filing
cabinets leaving little room to move.  Papers are scattered
everywhere, atop cabinets, on the floor, and in heaping mounds
surrounding a filled ashtray on the desk.  The floor is covered in a
dirty, brown carpet that has long faded it is dotted with tiny
cigarette burns and there is a large coffee stain in the corner.  Once
white, the paint on the bare walls is chipped and yellowed, and hints
of the original wood show around the larger dents and holes.  There is
an old chair shoved against the wall.{x
57302.name: {BM{banager's {BO{bffice {B[{bPolaris Courier{B]{x

description: {w Turning sharply, a narrow hallway branches off the loading docks.
A lantern hangs in the corner, slowly burning makou gas and casting
shadows in every direction.  The air is old, dust covering the lantern
and giving the hall a musty smell.  The sounds from the docks are loud
here.  {x
57409.name: {WL{*ong {WH{*allway {W[{*Dwarven Kingdom Courier{W]{x

a lever system stands to one side of the platform.  Scaffolds line the
walls, connecting to those of the inventory room and the dock,
scattered with crates and carts.  A door leads off in one direction,
and makou-burning lights lights hang from the ceiling.  {x

57404.name: {WL{*oading {WD{*ock {WA {W[{*Dwarven Kingdom Courier{W]{x

description: {r A narrow, windowless hallway leads from the manager's office to
the loading docks.  A thin coat of dust layers the floor and walls,
and the occasional lantern hangs on the wall casting a dim light.
Clattering and the odd shout sounds from the docks, breaking the
silence.  {x
57424.name: {RL{yong {RH{yallway{x

description: {cStale air carries an odd scent in the lobby of the courier.  Dingy
curtains hang to the sides of the windows, tied hastily aside Stale
air carries an odd scent in the lobby of the courier.  Dingy curtains
hang to the sides of the windows, tied hastily aside dirty ashtray on
it.  A stool stands against the opposite wall with a dead potted plant
on it, its leaves brown and cracked.  The walls are bare except a
single abstract painting that hangs crookedly above the couch.
Opposite the entrace is a door with a worn sign reading, "{CManager.{c"{x
57305.name: {BB{building {BL{bobby {B[{bPolaris Courier{B]{x

description: {r A wide platform connects a loading dock to Dock B, set up with a
tall pulley system.  A gently-angled ramp leads onto the platform, and
a lever system stands to one side of the platform.  Scaffolds line the
walls, connecting to those of the inventory room and the dock,
scattered with crates and carts.  A doorway leads off into a hallway
in one direction, and makou-burning lights hang from the ceiling.  {x
57422.name: {RL{yoading {RD{yock {RB{x

description: {cA broad tarmac opens, inviting airships to land.  One end
stretches down into a path, numerous docks branching off of it; on the
other end of the tarmack sits the entrance to a long, skinny building
that stretches parallel to the path.  It wraps around the docks and
meets a large building set up at the end of the docking strip.  A pair
of cracked windows look out beside the entrance of the building, and
jagged icicles hang down from the corners of the roof.  {x
57300.name: {BE{bntrance {Bt{bo {Bt{bhe {BC{bargo {BD{bocks {B[{bPolaris Courier{B]{x

description: Looks like the cityguards but very, very mean.
57300.room_name: {&In utter control the {CC{courier {GD{gock {RM{ranager{& wandering around directing business.{x
57300.name: The Courier Dock Manager~

description: Looks like the cityguards but very, very mean.

57301.name: The Courier Worker~
